p: The next dendrogram based on the distance measure (Euclidean distance) is presented in Fig 4. The values of Euclidean are lowest (the highest similarity between samples) for Lavandula stoechas, Lavandula lanata, Lavandula angustifolia „Rosea”, Lavandula angustifolia „Afropurpurea”, Lavandula angustifolia and one unknown species. The high value of Euclidean was obtained for the sample of Lavandula viridis and it confirms its low chemical similarity in comparison with the other samples.
